TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
(YOU CALLIN DIS AWFUL!? (Jk) http://derangedcarolean.tumblr.com/)

Granted, but you choose some 'questionable' fanworks to make

I wish for- I AM ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL OF THIS ANNOYINGORBITS

Granted. you get direct control of yourself again.

I wish for you to follow the signature rules

Granted, but he have "questionable" things in it

(by questionable mean rule 34 and 63, don't you?)

I wish i knew be heart the rules of internet

Edited October 18, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

granted you are the heart of the rules of the internet

I wish for $$$

Granted, people stealed it

(Did you know what "be hearth" mean)

I wish for cloud cuddle

(Yus MPM, the r34 & 63 things)

granted, 2 clouds cuddle right in the middle of an airway, making several planes blow up

I wish I knew Swedish

Granted, but you forget all but one word in said language.

I wish for better rockets in campaign mode..

Granted, but the rockets are so good the game crashes and Jeb explodes.

I wish I wouldn't pace the room every 30 minutes for 5 minutes.

Granted, you pace for 10 minutes instead.

I wish for world peace.

Granted but the world is now BOOOORING!

I wish the feds weren't coming for me (JK!)

granted but now EVERYONE else is after you

i wish i didn't have homework today

Granted, but you fail you exams

I wish I could simulate british english with text

granted the internet get's shut down by multiple SOPA likes

I wish macey would at least post a 2 second video to tell us he's still here

(YOU CALLIN DIS AWFUL!? (Jk) http://derangedcarolean.tumblr.com/)

Wait a minute, I am in your background, Rainbow Dash-flavored cupcake FTW!!!

404, WISH NOT FOUND.

I wish people could run 50 miles per hour (

)

Granted humans may not move at all!

I wish i had a alienware

Granted, but a million NOPEgineers come out and break the computer, and since Alienware has awful customer support, the NOPEgineers invade the world, making it full of NOPES!

I wish that you were in KSP.

granted, but i'm sent on a sacrificial mission to the sun

I wish to deploy ubercharge at any time, every time.

Granted, but you get sniped at light speed, dropping your infini-uber.

I wish for Dres to be a valuable place to land.

Granted. It's so valuable that everyone lands there, leaving no more space for you.

I wish for DOCTORRRRR!!!!

Granted, it's a Slenderman version of Doctor Who.

I wish the people at Drawception understood Homestuck
granted and thats all you get i wish that no one but me gets wishes

404 : FILE NOT FOUND

(I have a poor internet or what?)

I wish to be anthropomorphic

Granted, you are a cartoon Pony called scootaloo, you get killed at the Rainbow Factory

I wish Red dwarf XI would come out already and it was amazingly good.

Granted. seiries producer: M. Night Shamalan

ZodiaK. I wish to be an astronaut on the ISS
